code: import React from"react";import{positions}from"../data/data";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Positions=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"title",children:["Positions (",positions.length,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order-table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Instrument"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Qty."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Avg."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"LTP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"P&L"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Chg."})]}),positions.map((stock,index)=>{const curValue=stock.price*stock.qty;const isProfit=curValue-stock.avg*stock.qty>=0.0;const profClass=isProfit?"profit":"loss";const dayClass=stock.isLoss?"loss":"profit";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:stock.product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:stock.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:stock.qty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:stock.avg.toFixed(2)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:stock.price.toFixed(2)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:profClass,children:(curValue-stock.avg*stock.qty).toFixed(2)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:dayClass,children:stock.day})]},index);})]})})]});};export default Positions;
